mapper.select: SELECT su.USER_ID AS USER_ID, su.USER_SECURITY_NAME AS USER_SECURITY_NAME, su.USER_PASS_WORD AS USER_PASS_WORD, su.USER_IS_ENABLED AS USER_IS_ENABLED, su.USER_IS_ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED AS USER_IS_ACCOUNT_NON_EXPIRED, su.USER_IS_CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED AS USER_IS_CREDENTIALS_NON_EXPIRED, su.USER_IS_ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED AS USER_IS_ACCOUNT_NON_LOCKED, su.USER_CREAT_TIME_STAMP AS USER_CREAT_TIME_STAMP, su.USER_UPDATE_TIME_STAMP AS USER_UPDATE_TIME_STAMP, su.USER_IS_DELETE AS USER_IS_DELETE, su.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME, su.USER_NUMBER AS USER_NUMBER, su.USER_PHONE AS USER_PHONE, su.USER_EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL, GROUP_CONCAT(sa.AUTHORITY_NAME, '') AS AUTHORITY_NAMES FROM security.security_user su, security.security_user_role sur, security.security_role sr, security.security_role_authority sra, security.security_authority sa WHERE sa.AUTHORITY_ID = sra.AUTHORITY_ID AND sa.AUTHORITY_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sra.ROLE_ID = sr.ROLE_ID AND sra.ROLE_AUTHORITY_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sr.ROLE_ID = sur.ROLE_ID AND sr.ROLE_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sur.USER_ID = su.USER_ID AND sur.USER_ROLE_IS_DELETE = 0 AND su.USER_IS_DELETE = 0 AND su.USER_SECURITY_NAME = #{userName} GROUP BY su.USER_ID

SELECT sa.AUTHORITY_ID AS AUTHORITY_ID, sa.AUTHORITY_NAME AS AUTHORITY_NAME, sa.AUTHORITY_CONTENT AS AUTHORITY_CONTENT, sa.AUTHORITY_MENU AS AUTHORITY_MENU, sa.AUTHORITY_MENU_URL AS AUTHORITY_MENU_URL, sa.AUTHORITY_CREAT_TIME_STAMP AS AUTHORITY_CREAT_TIME_STAMP, sa.AUTHORITY_UPDATE_TIME_STAMP AS AUTHORITY_UPDATE_TIME_STAMP, sa.AUTHORITY_IS_DELETE AS AUTHORITY_IS_DELETE FROM security.security_user su, security.security_user_role sur, security.security_role sr, security.security_role_authority sra, security.security_authority sa WHERE sa.AUTHORITY_ID = sra.AUTHORITY_ID AND sa.AUTHORITY_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sra.ROLE_ID = sr.ROLE_ID AND sra.ROLE_AUTHORITY_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sr.ROLE_ID = sur.ROLE_ID AND sr.ROLE_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sur.USER_ID = su.USER_ID AND sur.USER_ROLE_IS_DELETE = 0 AND su.USER_IS_DELETE = 0 AND su.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT sa.AUTHORITY_CONTENT AS AUTHORITY_CONTENT, sa.AUTHORITY_MENU AS AUTHORITY_MENU, sa.AUTHORITY_MENU_URL AS AUTHORITY_MENU_URL FROM security.security_user su, security.security_user_role sur, security.security_role sr, security.security_role_authority sra, security.security_authority sa WHERE sa.AUTHORITY_ID = sra.AUTHORITY_ID AND sa.AUTHORITY_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sra.ROLE_ID = sr.ROLE_ID AND sra.ROLE_AUTHORITY_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sr.ROLE_ID = sur.ROLE_ID AND sr.ROLE_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sur.USER_ID = su.USER_ID AND sur.USER_ROLE_IS_DELETE = 0 AND su.USER_IS_DELETE = 0 AND su.USER_ID = #{userId}

SELECT sr.ROLE_ID AS ROLE_ID, sr.ROLE_NAME AS ROLE_NAME, sr.ROLE_IS_DELETE AS ROLE_IS_DELETE, sr.ROLE_CREAT_TIME_STAMP AS ROLE_CREAT_TIME_STAMP, sr.ROLE_UPDATE_TIME_STAMP AS ROLE_UPDATE_TIME_STAMP FROM security.security_user su, security.security_user_role sur, security.security_role sr WHERE sr.ROLE_ID = sur.ROLE_ID AND sr.ROLE_IS_DELETE = 0 AND sur.USER_ID = su.USER_ID AND sur.USER_ROLE_IS_DELETE = 0 AND su.USER_IS_DELETE = 0 AND su.USER_ID = #{userId}
